Ward–Tap an artifact
[i][i]Lieutenant[/i][/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a Food token.
[i]Cold Love[/i] – Whenever your commander enters or attacks, tap up to one target nonland permanent and put a stun counter on it. Felicia, Forever Loyal gains all activated abilities of that permanent for as long as it is tapped.
